Description: Responsibilities:▪ Assess and update CM process according to the new ITSM streamline process▪ Establishing the CM process links (Input/Output) with Project management process▪ Review and validate the CM process-related CSI records▪ Work with the CM module support team to implement and test the agreed enhancementSkills
Skills: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering / Computer Science or related fields. ITIL 3 foundation certification. ITIL 3 Practitioner certification. ITIL 3 Intermediate certifications. ITIL 4 foundation certification
10 years of experience with Change management.
Ability to use ITSM tools BMC-Remedy and Helix
Experienced in using Microsoft Office, MS Visio, and MS PowerPoint
